第1回: Lecture: Introduction to Organisational Behaviour, understanding the Problem-Based Learning (PBL) approach to education, A.I. options and guidelines, and discussion of the assignments for this class.
No set text book for this module but starter readings will be provided for each topic.
第2回: Seminar: PBL cycle 1 - Individuals, groups and teams. Session begins with group formation and then  problematisation.
Groups will generate their own path to read around this subject, though starter readings will be provided.
第3回: Seminar: PBL cycle 1 - Individuals, groups and teams. Session Focus is sharing readings, debate, and working towards a resolution to the problem set.

Groups will generate their own path to read around this subject, though starter readings will be provided. 

Groups to review assessment criteria.

Groups to develop slides/materials for the final PBL session in the cycle - Assessment.
第4回:
Seminar: PBL cycle 1 - Individuals, groups and teams. Session Provides space to develop and present findings to the class. 

Assessment: last 30-60 minutes (class size depending) - 10 minute presentations from each group. Feedback and marks x/15 to be provided.

Groups will generate their own path to read around this subject, though starter readings will be provided.

Groups should also take time to understand assessment feedback prior to the next PBL cycle.

Individuals should complete their 1 page summary for this cycle.
第5回: Seminar: PBL cycle 2 - Motivation and reward. Session begins problematisation.
Groups will generate their own path to read around this subject, though starter readings will be provided.
第6回: Seminar: PBL cycle 2 - Motivation and Reward. Session Focus is sharing readings, debate, and working towards a resolution to the problem set.

Groups will generate their own path to read around this subject, though starter readings will be provided. 

Groups to review assessment criteria.

Groups to develop slides/materials for the final PBL session in the cycle - Assessment.

Groups should also take time to understand assessment feedback prior to the next PBL cycle.

Individuals should complete their 1 page summary for this cycle.

第12回: Seminar: PBL cycle 4 - Conflict and Change. Session Focus is sharing readings, debate, and working towards a resolution to the problem set.

第13回:
Seminar: PBL cycle 4 - Conflict and Change. Session Provides space to develop and present findings to the class. 

Assessment: last 30-60 minutes (class size depending) - 10 minute presentations from each group. Feedback and marks x/15 to be provided.

Groups will generate their own path to read around this subject, though starter readings will be provided.

Individuals should complete their 4x1 page summary portfolio as a draft in advance of session 14.
第14回: Workshop: session will focus on on giving advice on draft portfolios. Note 4x1 pages worth 40% of overall score - must be completed individually.
Students to submit final versions of portfolios 5pm on the Friday following this session. Note this is a 24hr turn around post getting advice in session 14.

課題等へのフィードバック方法Methods for Providing Feed: Presentations will get immediate feedback at the end of each PBL cycle. Portfolios will get formative feedback in my office hours and/or in session 14. Final feedback from the module in week 8 in person and by email.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading2: プレゼンテーション・発表／Presentation (07)
成績評価Grading3: 備考　Note 60% - 4x 10 minute group presentations worth 15% each.40% - 4x 1 page individual summaries of the key learning from each PBL cycle.
